title: FS 1912 T202 "The Athletic Infield" PLUS Group; All Raw; (No Longer Available)

posts.post_title: FS 1912 T202 "The Athletic Infield" PLUS Group; All Raw; (No Longer Available)
posts.post_content:
Paypal FF or Venmo is OK.
Free shipping and insurance
Please PM here for interest/offers.

1912  T202 Hassan "The Athletic Infield" Krause/Thomas
Raw
Front, small tear bottom of center panel; small crease bottom of center panel, to the right of fold line. Scan shows cleanness of the rest.
Back, small tear bottom of center panel; small crease bottom of center panel, to the left of fold line; small stain above "THOMAS" top left. Scan shows cleanness of the rest.
$175 or b/o.

1910 T206 Barry (port.)
Raw
Flip is a "1" due to paper loss on back; case had a crack line; wasn't going to resubmit.
$100 or b/o.

1910 T206 Collins (port.)
Raw
Front, corner crease top left; light horizontal crease below top uniform button; light surface crease across the "A"; scan shows "cleanness" of the rest.
Back, small stain above "Cigarette"; tiny paper loss top right; scan shows "cleanness" of the rest.
$300 or b/o

1911 Baker (Polar Bear)
Raw
Front, Two surface creases; bottom up to elbow, top down to hand;
Registry good.
Back, surface crease, bottom up to "Assorted"; surface crease, top down to "r" of Polar Bear. Small tobacco smudge on border right. Otherwise, a pretty clean Polar Bear back.
$325 or b/o

1909 H. Davis Clean SC 150
Raw
Front, small surface crease, bottom left border to right arm.
$125.00 or b/o

Group: $800 or b/o.
